verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Muth-labben. A Psalm of David. I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with my whole heart <S%H3820><s%>; I will show forth <S%H5608><s%> all thy marvellous works <S%H6381><s%>.
I will be glad <S%H8055><s%> and exult <S%H5970><s%> in thee <S%H2167><s%>; I will sing praise to thy name <S%H8034><s%>, O thou Most High <S%H5945><s%>.
When mine enemies <S%H341><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H268><s%>, They stumble <S%H3782><s%> and perish <S%H6><s%> at thy presence <S%H6440><s%>.
For thou hast maintained <S%H6213><s%> my right <S%H4941><s%> and my cause <S%H1779><s%>; Thou sittest <S%H3427><s%> in the throne <S%H3678><s%> judging <S%H8199><s%> righteously <S%H6664><s%>.

Thou hast rebuked <S%H1605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, thou hast destroyed <S%H6><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; Thou hast blotted out <S%H4229><s%> their name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.

The enemy <S%H341><s%> are come to an end <S%H8552><s%>, they are desolate <S%H2723><s%> for ever <S%H5331><s%>; And the cities <S%H6145><s%> which thou hast overthrown <S%H5428><s%>, The very remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of them <S%H1992><s%> is perished <S%H6><s%>.
But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sitteth <S%H3427><s%> as king for ever <S%H5769><s%>: He hath prepared <S%H3559><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> for judgment <S%H4941><s%>;
And he will judge <S%H8199><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> in righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, He will minister judgment <S%H1777><s%> to the peoples <S%H3816><s%> in uprightness <S%H4339><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> also will be a high tower <S%H4869><s%> for the oppressed <S%H1790><s%>, A high tower <S%H4869><s%> in times <S%H6256><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>;
And they that know <S%H3045><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> will put their trust <S%H982><s%> in thee <S%H3068><s%>; For thou, Jehovah, hast not forsaken <S%H5800><s%> them that seek thee <S%H1875><s%>.
Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, who dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%>: Declare <S%H5046><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%> his doings <S%H5949><s%>.
For he that maketh inquisition <S%H1875><s%> for blood <S%H1818><s%> remembereth <S%H2142><s%> them <S%H7911><s%>; He forgetteth not the cry <S%H6818><s%> of the poor <S%H6035><s%>.

Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah; Behold <S%H7200><s%> my affliction <S%H6040><s%> which I suffer of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> me <S%H7311><s%>, Thou that liftest me up from the gates <S%H8179><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>;

That I may show forth <S%H5608><s%> all thy praise <S%H8416><s%>. In the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> I will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in thy salvation <S%H3444><s%>.

The nations <S%H1471><s%> are sunk down <S%H2883><s%> in the pit <S%H7845><s%> that they made <S%H6213><s%>: In the net <S%H7568><s%> which <S%H2098><s%> they hid <S%H2934><s%> is their own foot <S%H7272><s%> taken <S%H3920><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath made himself known <S%H3045><s%>, he hath executed <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>: The wicked <S%H7563><s%> is snared <S%H5367><s%> in the work <S%H6467><s%> of his own hands <S%H3709><s%>. [Higgaion <S%H1902><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>]
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be turned <S%H7725><s%> back unto Sheol <S%H7585><s%>, Even all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that forget <S%H7913><s%> God <S%H430><s%>.
For the needy <S%H34><s%> shall not alway <S%H5331><s%> be forgotten <S%H7911><s%>, Nor the expectation <S%H8615><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; Let not man <S%H582><s%> prevail <S%H5810><s%>: Let the nations <S%H1471><s%> be judged <S%H8199><s%> in thy sight <S%H6440><s%>.
Put <S%H7896><s%> them in fear <S%H4172><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Let the nations <S%H1471><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> themselves to be but men <S%H582><s%>. [Selah <S%H5542><s%>]
